name: Box Jump?
description:
-Credits-

Box Jump? created at GBC Jam #3 (Chaos) by Carlo Albino. August 20, 2016.

Music by BossLevelVGM. BossLevelVGM.com

Download: http://opengameart.org/content/mink-pohawk

Background art by ansimuz.

Download: http://opengameart.org/content/industrial-parallax...

Other sprites from UE4 tutorial.

Download:https://forums.unrealengine.com/showthread.php?678...

-Controls-

Return to Main Menu CRTL+M

Reset level CRTL+R

Quit game CRTL+Q

GamePad (NOTE: Assign controls before starting the game)

L1 -> left bumper

R1 -> right bumper

Cross -> A button

Circle -> B button

Triangle -> Y button

Square -> X button

Left horizontal and vertical -> Left stick
